entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late this morning. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
